The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16770](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16770.html) (Chainparams: Decouple AllowAcceptNonstd() f
Closing since competing https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16524 was merged instead.
This `nFeePerK` is shadowing the `nFeePerK` in the outer scope.

Yes, it is. And more of the same below. But in every use of their own nFeePerK they initialize it.\nAnyway, what do you think I should do?\nPerhaps just rename the variable? any suggestion on the name?
I would use another variable name to disambiguate :)
